name: Floody Hell
description:
Our research facility is doomed: floody demons are hell-bent on scuttling the ship, and I hate to say, they’re good at it! We can only delay the inevitable while the personnel escapes to safety.

Your task is to find them all and shoot any threat on sight.

Give ‘em floody hell!

Controls:

  • Move - WASD
  • Jump and Double Jump - SPACE
  • Shoot - LEFT CLICK
  • Dash - SHIFT
